name: BeatEmUp Three
description:
A rough, work-in-progress BeatEmUp in Godot created for Weekly Jam #261. I'd say it's unplayable at the moment, though if you can fight through the 5 waves to the credits, you've seen everything.

Movement via WASD or arrow keys, punch with E or Space.

Has quite a few bugs, especially in the combat - will be working through those after the jam!

Can also be played here: https://beatemup3.russmatney.com/
